Package com.corochat.app.client.controllers

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.corochat.app.client.controllers.LoginController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable

    The main controller of the FXML App

    The LoginController class implements the Initializable interface in order to setup our panels and disable the buttons. It handle Button, Text Area and Text Input mouse events / context menu events

    //TODO Include the diagram of LoginController

    0.0.1

      • isValidPassword

        private boolean isValidPassword​(javafx.scene.control.PasswordField password)
        Check if the complexity of a password.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to be check
        Returns:
        boolean - True if the password contains at least one lowercase, one uppercase, one number, one special character and a minimum of 8 to a maximum of 32 characters
        See Also:
        PasswordField, PasswordValidator, PasswordValidator.isValid(String)
